text: It’s a really great article about the electoral college, too. But I am a sucker for facts about election night reporting norms.
author: jeremybowers

text:
A thought while reading @Nate_Cohn’s piece on the electoral college this AM: @archietse (yes, @nytgraphics and ArchieML Archie) standardized the GOP/red, Dem/blue color scheme in 2000.  

Regan’s 1980 planning map had the colors flipped!

https://www.nytimes.com/2019/03/22/upshot/electoral-college-votes-states.html …
